51 int sys_chdir(const char *path) {
52  SignalGuard sguard;
53  HelAction actions[3];
54  globalQueue.trim();
55 
56  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
57  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::CHDIR);
58  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), path));
59 
60  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
61  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
62  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
63  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
64  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
65  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
66  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
67  actions[1].length = ser.size();
68  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
69  actions[2].flags = 0;
70  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
71  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
72 
73  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
74  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
75  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
76  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
77 
78  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
79  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
80  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
81 
82  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
83  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
84  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
85  return ENOENT;
86  }else{
87  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
88  return 0;
89  }
90 }

170 int sys_mkdirat(int dirfd, const char *path, mode_t mode) {
171  (void)mode;
172  SignalGuard sguard;
173  HelAction actions[3];
174  globalQueue.trim();
175 
176  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
177  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::MKDIRAT);
178  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), path));
179  req.set_fd(dirfd);
180 
181  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
182  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
183  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
184  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
185  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
186  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
187  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
188  actions[1].length = ser.size();
189  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
190  actions[2].flags = 0;
191  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
192  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
193 
194  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
195  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
196  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
197  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
198 
199  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
200  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
201  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
202 
203  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
204  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
205  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ALREADY_EXISTS) {
206  return EEXIST;
207  } else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_ARGUMENTS) {
208  return EINVAL;
209  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::BAD_FD) {
210  return EBADF;
211  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
212  return ENOENT;
213  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NOT_A_DIRECTORY) {
214  return ENOTDIR;
215  }else{
216  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
217  return 0;
218  }
219 }

225 int sys_symlinkat(const char *target_path, int dirfd, const char *link_path) {
226  SignalGuard sguard;
227 
228  managarm::posix::SymlinkAtRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
229  req.set_fd(dirfd);
230  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), link_path));
231  req.set_target_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), target_path));
232 
233  auto [offer, send_head, send_tail, recv_resp] =
234  exchangeMsgsSync(
235  getPosixLane(),
236  helix_ng::offer(
237  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadTail(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
238  helix_ng::recvInline()
239  )
240  );
241 
242  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
243  HEL_CHECK(send_head.error());
244  HEL_CHECK(send_tail.error());
245  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
246 
247  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
248  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
249  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
250  return 0;
251 }

334 HelHandle __raw_map(int fd) {
335  SignalGuard sguard;
336  HelAction actions[4];
337  globalQueue.trim();
338 
339  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
340  if (!handle)
341  return 0;
342 
343  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
344  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::MMAP);
345  req.set_fd(fd);
346 
347  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
348  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
349  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
350  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
351  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
352  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
353  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
354  actions[1].length = ser.size();
355  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
356  actions[2].flags = kHelItemChain;
357  actions[3].type = kHelActionPullDescriptor;
358  actions[3].flags = 0;
359  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 4,
360  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
361 
362  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
363  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
364  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
365  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
366  auto pull_memory = parseHandle(element);
367 
368  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
369  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
370  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
371  HEL_CHECK(pull_memory->error);
372 
373  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
374  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
375  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
376  return pull_memory->handle;
377 }

381 int sys_fcntl(int fd, int request, va_list args, int *result) {
382  SignalGuard sguard;
383  if(request == F_DUPFD) {
384  int newfd;
385  if(int e = sys_dup(fd, 0, &newfd); e)
386  return e;
387  *result = newfd;
388  return 0;
389  }else if(request == F_DUPFD_CLOEXEC) {
390  int newfd;
391  if(int e = sys_dup(fd, O_CLOEXEC, &newfd); e)
392  return e;
393  *result = newfd;
394  return 0;
395  }else if(request == F_GETFD) {
396  HelAction actions[3];
397  globalQueue.trim();
398 
399  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
400  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::FD_GET_FLAGS);
401  req.set_fd(fd);
402 
403  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
404  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
405  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
406  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
407  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
408  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
409  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
410  actions[1].length = ser.size();
411  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
412  actions[2].flags = 0;
413  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
414  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
415 
416  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
417  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
418  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
419  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
420 
421  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
422  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
423  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
424 
425  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
426  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
427  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NO_SUCH_FD)
428  return EBADF;
429  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
430  *result = resp.flags();
431  return 0;
432  }else if(request == F_SETFD) {
433  HelAction actions[3];
434  globalQueue.trim();
435 
436  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
437  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::FD_SET_FLAGS);
438  req.set_fd(fd);
439  req.set_flags(va_arg(args, int));
440 
441  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
442  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
443  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
444  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
445  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
446  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
447  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
448  actions[1].length = ser.size();
449  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
450  actions[2].flags = 0;
451  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
452  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
453 
454  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
455  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
456  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
457  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
458 
459  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
460  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
461  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
462 
463  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
464  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
465  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NO_SUCH_FD)
466  return EBADF;
467  else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_ARGUMENTS)
468  return EINVAL;
469  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
470  *result = static_cast<int>(resp.error());
471  return 0;
472  }else if(request == F_GETFL) {
473  SignalGuard sguard;
474  HelAction actions[3];
475  globalQueue.trim();
476 
477  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
478  if (!handle)
479  return EBADF;
480 
481  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
482  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_GET_FILE_FLAGS);
483  req.set_fd(fd);
484 
485  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
486  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
487  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
488  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
489  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
490  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
491  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
492  actions[1].length = ser.size();
493  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
494  actions[2].flags = 0;
495  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 3,
496  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
497 
498  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
499  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
500  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
501  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
502 
503  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
504  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
505  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
506 
507  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
508  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
509  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ILLEGAL_OPERATION_TARGET) {
510  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: fcntl(F_GETFL) unimplemented for this file\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
511  return EINVAL;
512  }
513  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
514  *result = resp.flags();
515  return 0;
516  }else if(request == F_SETFL) {
517  SignalGuard sguard;
518  HelAction actions[3];
519  globalQueue.trim();
520 
521  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
522  if (!handle)
523  return EBADF;
524 
525  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
526  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_SET_FILE_FLAGS);
527  req.set_fd(fd);
528  req.set_flags(va_arg(args, int));
529 
530  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
531  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
532  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
533  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
534  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
535  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
536  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
537  actions[1].length = ser.size();
538  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
539  actions[2].flags = 0;
540  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 3,
541  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
542 
543  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
544  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
545  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
546  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
547 
548  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
549  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
550  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
551 
552  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
553  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
554  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ILLEGAL_OPERATION_TARGET) {
555  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: fcntl(F_SETFL) unimplemented for this file\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
556  return EINVAL;
557  }
558  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
559  *result = 0;
560  return 0;
561  }else if(request == F_SETLK) {
562  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: F_SETLK\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
563  return 0;
564  }else if(request == F_SETLKW) {
565  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: F_SETLKW\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
566  return 0;
567  }else if(request == F_GETLK) {
568  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: F_GETLK\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
569  return ENOSYS;
570  }else if(request == F_ADD_SEALS) {
571  auto seals = va_arg(args, int);
572  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
573  if (!handle)
574  return EBADF;
575 
576  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
577  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_ADD_SEALS);
578  req.set_fd(fd);
579  req.set_seals(seals);
580 
581  auto [offer, send_req, recv_resp] = exchangeMsgsSync(handle,
582  helix_ng::offer(
583  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadOnly(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
584  helix_ng::RecvInline()
585  ));
586 
587  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
588  HEL_CHECK(send_req.error());
589  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
590 
591  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
592  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
593  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ILLEGAL_OPERATION_TARGET) {
594  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: fcntl(F_ADD_SEALS) unimplemented for this file\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
595  return EINVAL;
596  } else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS) {
597  return EPERM;
598  }
599  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
600 
601  *result = resp.seals();
602  return 0;
603  }else if(request == F_GET_SEALS) {
604  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
605  if (!handle)
606  return EBADF;
607 
608  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
609  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_GET_SEALS);
610  req.set_fd(fd);
611 
612  auto [offer, send_req, recv_resp] = exchangeMsgsSync(handle,
613  helix_ng::offer(
614  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadOnly(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
615  helix_ng::RecvInline()
616  ));
617 
618  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
619  HEL_CHECK(send_req.error());
620  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
621 
622  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
623  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
624  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ILLEGAL_OPERATION_TARGET) {
625  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: fcntl(F_GET_SEALS) unimplemented for this file\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
626  return EINVAL;
627  }
628  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
629  *result = resp.seals();
630  return 0;
631  }else{
632  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: Unexpected fcntl() request: "
633  << request << "\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
634  return EINVAL;
635  }
636 }

642 int sys_read_entries(int fd, void *buffer, size_t max_size, size_t *bytes_read) {
643  SignalGuard sguard;
644  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
645  if (!handle)
646  return EBADF;
647 
648  HelAction actions[3];
649  globalQueue.trim();
650 
651  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
652  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_READ_ENTRIES);
653 
654  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
655  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
656  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
657  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
658  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
659  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
660  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
661  actions[1].length = ser.size();
662  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
663  actions[2].flags = 0;
664  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 3,
665  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
666 
667  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
668  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
669  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
670  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
671 
672  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
673  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
674  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
675 
676  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
677  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
678  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::END_OF_FILE) {
679  *bytes_read = 0;
680  return 0;
681  }else{
682  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
683  __ensure(max_size > sizeof(struct dirent));
684  auto ent = new (buffer) struct dirent;
685  memset(ent, 0, sizeof(struct dirent));
686  memcpy(ent->d_name, resp.path().data(), resp.path().size());
687  ent->d_reclen = sizeof(struct dirent);
688  *bytes_read = sizeof(struct dirent);
689  return 0;
690  }
691 }

703  req.SerializeToString(&ser);

705  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;

707  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
708  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
709  actions[1].length = ser.size();
710  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
711  actions[2].flags = 0;
712  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
713  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));

1000 int sys_socket(int domain, int type_and_flags, int proto, int *fd) {
1001  constexpr int type_mask = int(0xFFFF);
1002  constexpr int flags_mask = ~int(0xFFFF);
1003  __ensure(!((type_and_flags & flags_mask) & ~(SOCK_CLOEXEC | SOCK_NONBLOCK)));
1004 
1005  SignalGuard sguard;
1006 
1007  managarm::posix::SocketRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1008  req.set_domain(domain);
1009  req.set_socktype(type_and_flags & type_mask);
1010  req.set_protocol(proto);
1011  req.set_flags(type_and_flags & flags_mask);
1012 
1013  auto [offer, sendReq, recvResp] = exchangeMsgsSync(
1014  getPosixLane(),
1015  helix_ng::offer(
1016  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadOnly(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
1017  helix_ng::recvInline()
1018  )
1019  );
1020 
1021  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
1022  HEL_CHECK(sendReq.error());
1023  HEL_CHECK(recvResp.error());
1024 
1025  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1026  resp.ParseFromArray(recvResp.data(), recvResp.length());
1027  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_ARGUMENTS) {
1028  return EAFNOSUPPORT;
1029  } else {
1030  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1031  *fd = resp.fd();
1032  return 0;
1033  }
1034 }

1110 int sys_msg_send(int sockfd, const struct msghdr *hdr, int flags, ssize_t *length) {
1111  HelSgItem sglist[4];
1112  __ensure(hdr->msg_iovlen <= 4);
1113  auto handle = getHandleForFd(sockfd);
1114  if (!handle)
1115  return EBADF;
1116 
1117  size_t overall_size = 0;
1118  for(int i = 0; i < hdr->msg_iovlen; i++) {
1119  sglist[i].buffer = hdr->msg_iov[i].iov_base;
1120  sglist[i].length = hdr->msg_iov[i].iov_len;
1121  overall_size += hdr->msg_iov[i].iov_len;
1122  }
1123 
1124  SignalGuard sguard;
1125  HelAction actions[6];
1126  globalQueue.trim();
1127 
1128  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1129  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_SENDMSG);
1130  req.set_flags(flags);
1131  req.set_size(overall_size);
1132 
1133  for(auto cmsg = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(hdr); cmsg; cmsg = CMSG_NXTHDR(hdr, cmsg)) {
1134  __ensure(cmsg->cmsg_level == SOL_SOCKET);
1135  __ensure(cmsg->cmsg_type == SCM_RIGHTS);
1136  __ensure(cmsg->cmsg_len >= sizeof(struct cmsghdr));
1137 
1138  size_t size = cmsg->cmsg_len - CMSG_ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr));
1139  __ensure(!(size % sizeof(int)));
1140  for(size_t off = 0; off < size; off += sizeof(int)) {
1141  int fd;
1142  memcpy(&fd, CMSG_DATA(cmsg) + off, sizeof(int));
1143  req.add_fds(fd);
1144  }
1145  }
1146 
1147  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
1148  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
1149 
1150  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1151  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1152 
1153  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1154  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
1155  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
1156  actions[1].length = ser.size();
1157 
1158  actions[2].type = kHelActionSendFromBufferSg;
1159  actions[2].flags = kHelItemChain;
1160  actions[2].buffer = &sglist;
1161  actions[2].length = hdr->msg_iovlen;
1162 
1163  actions[3].type = kHelActionImbueCredentials;
1164  actions[3].handle = kHelThisThread;
1165  actions[3].flags = kHelItemChain;
1166 
1167  actions[4].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1168  actions[4].flags = kHelItemChain;
1169  actions[4].buffer = hdr->msg_name;
1170  actions[4].length = hdr->msg_namelen;
1171 
1172  actions[5].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
1173  actions[5].flags = 0;
1174  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 6,
1175  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1176 
1177  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1178  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1179  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1180  auto send_data = parseSimple(element);
1181  auto imbue_creds = parseSimple(element);
1182  auto send_addr = parseSimple(element);
1183  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1184 
1185  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
1186  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
1187  HEL_CHECK(send_data->error);
1188  HEL_CHECK(imbue_creds->error);
1189  HEL_CHECK(send_addr->error);
1190  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
1191 
1192  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1193  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1194 
1195  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::BROKEN_PIPE) {
1196  return EPIPE;
1197  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::NOT_CONNECTED) {
1198  return ENOTCONN;
1199  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::WOULD_BLOCK) {
1200  return EAGAIN;
1201  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::HOST_UNREACHABLE) {
1202  return EHOSTUNREACH;
1203  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ACCESS_DENIED) {
1204  return EACCES;
1205  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::NETWORK_UNREACHABLE) {
1206  return ENETUNREACH;
1207  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::DESTINATION_ADDRESS_REQUIRED) {
1208  return EDESTADDRREQ;
1209  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE) {
1210  return EADDRNOTAVAIL;
1211  }else{
1212  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
1213  *length = resp.size();
1214  return 0;
1215  }
1216 }

1218 int sys_msg_recv(int sockfd, struct msghdr *hdr, int flags, ssize_t *length) {
1219  if(!hdr->msg_iovlen) {
1220  return EMSGSIZE;
1221  }
1222 
1223  auto handle = getHandleForFd(sockfd);
1224  if (!handle)
1225  return EBADF;
1226 
1227  SignalGuard sguard;
1228  HelAction actions[7];

1235  req.set_addr_size(hdr->msg_namelen);
1236  req.set_ctrl_size(hdr->msg_controllen);

1240 
1241  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1242  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1243

1245  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;

1247  actions[1].length = ser.size();

1251  actions[2].flags = kHelItemChain;

1269  actions[6].length = hdr->msg_controllen;
1270  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(handle, actions, 7,
1271  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1272 
1273  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1274  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1275  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1276  auto imbue_creds = parseSimple(element);
1277  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1278  auto recv_addr = parseLength(element);
1279  auto recv_data = parseLength(element);
1280  auto recv_ctrl = parseLength(element);

1288  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1289 
1290  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::WOULD_BLOCK) {
1291  return EAGAIN;
1292  }else{
1293  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
1294  HEL_CHECK(recv_addr->error);
1295  HEL_CHECK(recv_data->error);
1296  HEL_CHECK(recv_ctrl->error);
1297 
1298  hdr->msg_namelen = resp.addr_size();
1299  hdr->msg_controllen = recv_ctrl->length;
1300  *length = recv_data->length;
1301  return 0;
1302  }
1303 }

1305 int sys_pselect(int, fd_set *read_set, fd_set *write_set,
1306  fd_set *except_set, const struct timespec *timeout,
1307  const sigset_t *sigmask, int *num_events) {
1308  // TODO: Do not keep errors from epoll (?).
1309  int fd = epoll_create1(0);
1310  if(fd == -1)
1311  return -1;
1312 
1313  for(int k = 0; k < FD_SETSIZE; k++) {
1314  struct epoll_event ev;
1315  memset(&ev, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
1316 
1317  if(read_set && FD_ISSET(k, read_set))
1318  ev.events |= EPOLLIN; // TODO: Additional events.
1319  if(write_set && FD_ISSET(k, write_set))
1320  ev.events |= EPOLLOUT; // TODO: Additional events.
1321  if(except_set && FD_ISSET(k, except_set))
1322  ev.events |= EPOLLPRI;
1323 
1324  if(!ev.events)
1325  continue;
1326  ev.data.u32 = k;
1327 
1328  if(epoll_ctl(fd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, k, &ev))
1329  return -1;
1330  }
1331 
1332  struct epoll_event evnts[16];
1333  int n = epoll_pwait(fd, evnts, 16,
1334  timeout ? (timeout->tv_sec * 1000 + timeout->tv_nsec / 100) : -1, sigmask);
1335  if(n == -1)
1336  return -1;
1337 
1338  fd_set res_read_set;
1339  fd_set res_write_set;
1340  fd_set res_except_set;
1341  FD_ZERO(&res_read_set);
1342  FD_ZERO(&res_write_set);
1343  FD_ZERO(&res_except_set);
1344  int m = 0;
1345 
1346  for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1347  int k = evnts[i].data.u32;
1348 
1349  if(read_set && FD_ISSET(k, read_set)
1350  && evnts[i].events & (EPOLLIN | EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP)) {
1351  FD_SET(k, &res_read_set);
1352  m++;
1353  }
1354 
1355  if(write_set && FD_ISSET(k, write_set)
1356  && evnts[i].events & (EPOLLOUT | EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP)) {
1357  FD_SET(k, &res_write_set);
1358  m++;
1359  }
1360 
1361  if(except_set && FD_ISSET(k, except_set)
1362  && evnts[i].events & EPOLLPRI) {
1363  FD_SET(k, &res_except_set);
1364  m++;
1365  }
1366  }
1367 
1368  if(close(fd))
1369  __ensure("close() failed on epoll file");
1370 
1371  if(read_set)
1372  memcpy(read_set, &res_read_set, sizeof(fd_set));
1373  if(write_set)
1374  memcpy(write_set, &res_write_set, sizeof(fd_set));
1375  if(except_set)
1376  memcpy(except_set, &res_except_set, sizeof(fd_set));
1377 
1378  *num_events = m;
1379  return 0;
1380 }
1381 
1382 int sys_poll(struct pollfd *fds, nfds_t count, int timeout, int *num_events) {
1383  __ensure(timeout >= 0 || timeout == -1); // TODO: Report errors correctly.
1384 
1385  SignalGuard sguard;
1386  HelAction actions[3];
1387  globalQueue.trim();
1388 
1389  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1390  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::EPOLL_CALL);
1391  req.set_timeout(timeout > 0 ? int64_t{timeout} * 1000000 : timeout);
1392 
1393  for(nfds_t i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1394  req.add_fds(fds[i].fd);
1395  req.add_events(fds[i].events);
1396  }
1397 
1398  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
1399  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
1400  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1401  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1402  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1403  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
1404  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
1405  actions[1].length = ser.size();
1406  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
1407  actions[2].flags = 0;
1408  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
1409  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1410 
1411  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1412  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1413  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1414  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1415 
1416  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
1417  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
1418  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
1419 
1420  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1421  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1422  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1423  __ensure(resp.events_size() == count);
1424 
1425  int m = 0;
1426  for(nfds_t i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1427  if(resp.events(i))
1428  m++;
1429  fds[i].revents = resp.events(i);
1430  }
1431 
1432  *num_events = m;
1433  return 0;
1434 }

1480 int sys_epoll_ctl(int epfd, int mode, int fd, struct epoll_event *ev) {
1481  SignalGuard sguard;
1482  HelAction actions[3];
1483  globalQueue.trim();
1484 
1485  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1486  if(mode == EPOLL_CTL_ADD) {
1487  __ensure(ev);
1488  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::EPOLL_ADD);
1489  req.set_flags(ev->events);
1490  req.set_cookie(ev->data.u64);
1491  }else if(mode == EPOLL_CTL_MOD) {
1492  __ensure(ev);
1493  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::EPOLL_MODIFY);
1494  req.set_flags(ev->events);
1495  req.set_cookie(ev->data.u64);
1496  }else if(mode == EPOLL_CTL_DEL) {
1497  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::EPOLL_DELETE);
1498  }else{
1499  mlibc::panicLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: Illegal epoll_ctl() mode\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
1500  }
1501  req.set_fd(epfd);
1502  req.set_newfd(fd);
1503 
1504  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
1505  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
1506  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1507  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1508  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1509  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
1510  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
1511  actions[1].length = ser.size();
1512  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
1513  actions[2].flags = 0;
1514  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
1515  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1516 
1517  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1518  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1519  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1520  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1521 
1522  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
1523  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
1524  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
1525 
1526  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1527  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1528  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::BAD_FD) {
1529  return EBADF;
1530  } else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ALREADY_EXISTS) {
1531  return EEXIST;
1532  } else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
1533  return ENOENT;
1534  } else {
1535  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1536  return 0;
1537  }
1538  return 0;
1539 }

1541 int sys_epoll_pwait(int epfd, struct epoll_event *ev, int n,
1542  int timeout, const sigset_t *sigmask, int *raised) {
1543  __ensure(timeout >= 0 || timeout == -1); // TODO: Report errors correctly.
1544 
1545  SignalGuard sguard;
1546  HelAction actions[4];
1547  globalQueue.trim();
1548 
1549  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1550  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::EPOLL_WAIT);
1551  req.set_fd(epfd);
1552  req.set_size(n);
1553  req.set_timeout(timeout > 0 ? int64_t{timeout} * 1000000 : timeout);
1554  if(sigmask != NULL) {
1555  req.set_sigmask((long int)*sigmask);
1556  req.set_sigmask_needed(true);
1557  } else {
1558  req.set_sigmask_needed(false);
1559  }
1560 
1561  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
1562  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
1563  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1564  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1565  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1566  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
1567  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
1568  actions[1].length = ser.size();
1569  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
1570  actions[2].flags = kHelItemChain;
1571  actions[3].type = kHelActionRecvToBuffer;
1572  actions[3].flags = 0;
1573  actions[3].buffer = ev;
1574  actions[3].length = n * sizeof(struct epoll_event);
1575  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 4,
1576  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1577 
1578  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1579  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1580  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1581  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1582  auto recv_data = parseLength(element);
1583 
1584  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
1585  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
1586  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
1587  HEL_CHECK(recv_data->error);
1588 
1589  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1590  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1591  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::BAD_FD) {
1592  return EBADF;
1593  }
1594  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1595  __ensure(!(recv_data->length % sizeof(struct epoll_event)));
1596  *raised = recv_data->length / sizeof(struct epoll_event);
1597  return 0;
1598 }

1682 int sys_signalfd_create(const sigset_t *masks, int flags, int *fd) {
1683  __ensure(!(flags & ~(SFD_CLOEXEC | SFD_NONBLOCK)));
1684 
1685  uint32_t proto_flags = 0;
1686  if(flags & SFD_CLOEXEC)
1687  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_CLOEXEC;
1688  if(flags & SFD_NONBLOCK)
1689  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_NONBLOCK;
1690 
1691  SignalGuard sguard;
1692  HelAction actions[3];
1693  globalQueue.trim();
1694 
1695  managarm::posix::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1696  req.set_request_type(managarm::posix::CntReqType::SIGNALFD_CREATE);
1697  req.set_flags(proto_flags);
1698  req.set_sigset(*masks);
1699 
1700  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
1701  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
1702  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
1703  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
1704  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
1705  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
1706  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
1707  actions[1].length = ser.size();
1708  actions[2].type = kHelActionRecvInline;
1709  actions[2].flags = 0;
1710  HEL_CHECK(helSubmitAsync(getPosixLane(), actions, 3,
1711  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));
1712 
1713  auto element = globalQueue.dequeueSingle();
1714  auto offer = parseHandle(element);
1715  auto send_req = parseSimple(element);
1716  auto recv_resp = parseInline(element);
1717 
1718  HEL_CHECK(offer->error);
1719  HEL_CHECK(send_req->error);
1720  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp->error);
1721 
1722  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1723  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp->data, recv_resp->length);
1724  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1725  *fd = resp.fd();

1828 int sys_ioctl(int fd, unsigned long request, void *arg, int *result) {
1829 // mlibc::infoLogger() << "mlibc: ioctl with"
1830 // << " type: 0x" << frg::hex_fmt(_IOC_TYPE(request))
1831 // << ", number: 0x" << frg::hex_fmt(_IOC_NR(request))
1832 // << " (raw request: " << frg::hex_fmt(request) << ")"
1833 // << " on fd " << fd << frg::endlog;
1834 
1835  SignalGuard sguard;
1836  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
1837  if(!handle)
1838  return EBADF;
1839 
1840  switch(request) {
1841  case FIONBIO: {
1842  auto mode = reinterpret_cast<int *>(arg);
1843  int flags = fcntl(fd, F_GETFL, 0);
1844  if(*mode) {
1845  fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, flags | O_NONBLOCK);
1846  }else{
1847  fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, flags & ~O_NONBLOCK);
1848  }
1849  return 0;
1850  }
1851  case FIONREAD: {
1852  auto argp = reinterpret_cast<int *>(arg);
1853 
1854  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
1855  if (!handle)
1856  return EBADF;
1857 
1858  if(!argp)
1859  return EINVAL;
1860 
1861  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1862  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::PT_IOCTL);
1863  req.set_command(FIONREAD);
1864 
1865  auto [offer, send_req, recv_resp] =
1866  exchangeMsgsSync(
1867  handle,
1868  helix_ng::offer(
1869  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadOnly(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
1870  helix_ng::recvInline()
1871  )
1872  );
1873 
1874  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
1875  HEL_CHECK(send_req.error());
1876  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
1877 
1878  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1879  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
1880  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
1881 
1882  *argp = resp.fionread_count();
1883 
1884  return 0;
1885  }
1886  case FIOCLEX: {
1887  managarm::posix::IoctlFioclexRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
1888  req.set_fd(fd);
1889 
1890  auto [offer, sendReq, recvResp] = exchangeMsgsSync(
1891  getPosixLane(),
1892  helix_ng::offer(
1893  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadOnly(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
1894  helix_ng::recvInline()
1895  )
1896  );
1897 
1898  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
1899  HEL_CHECK(sendReq.error());
1900  if(recvResp.error() == kHelErrDismissed)
1901  return EINVAL;
1902  HEL_CHECK(recvResp.error());
1903 
1904  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
1905  resp.ParseFromArray(recvResp.data(), recvResp.length());
1906  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
1907  return 0;
1908  }

3739 int sys_openat(int dirfd, const char *path, int flags, mode_t mode, int *fd) {
3740  SignalGuard sguard;
3741 
3742  uint32_t proto_flags = 0;
3743  if(flags & O_CREAT)
3744  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_CREATE;
3745  if(flags & O_EXCL)
3746  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_EXCLUSIVE;
3747  if(flags & O_NONBLOCK)
3748  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_NONBLOCK;
3749  if(flags & O_TRUNC)
3750  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_TRUNC;
3751 
3752  if(flags & O_CLOEXEC)
3753  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_CLOEXEC;
3754  if(flags & O_NOCTTY)
3755  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_NOCTTY;
3756 
3757  if(flags & O_RDONLY)
3758  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_RDONLY;
3759  else if(flags & O_WRONLY)
3760  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_WRONLY;
3761  else if(flags & O_RDWR)
3762  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_RDWR;
3763  else if(flags & O_PATH)
3764  proto_flags |= managarm::posix::OpenFlags::OF_PATH;
3765 
3766  managarm::posix::OpenAtRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
3767  req.set_fd(dirfd);
3768  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), path));
3769  req.set_flags(proto_flags);
3770 
3771  auto [offer, sendHead, sendTail, recvResp] = exchangeMsgsSync(
3772  getPosixLane(),
3773  helix_ng::offer(
3774  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadTail(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
3775  helix_ng::recvInline()
3776  )
3777  );
3778 
3779  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
3780  HEL_CHECK(sendHead.error());
3781  HEL_CHECK(sendTail.error());
3782  HEL_CHECK(recvResp.error());
3783 
3784  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
3785  resp.ParseFromArray(recvResp.data(), recvResp.length());
3786  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
3787  return ENOENT;
3788  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ALREADY_EXISTS) {
3789  return EEXIST;
3790  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NOT_A_DIRECTORY) {
3791  return ENOTDIR;
3792  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_OPERATION_TARGET) {
3793  mlibc::infoLogger() << "\e[31mmlibc: openat unimplemented for this file " << path << "\e[39m" << frg::endlog;
3794  return EINVAL;
3795  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NO_BACKING_DEVICE) {
3796  return ENXIO;
3797  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::IS_DIRECTORY) {
3798  return EISDIR;
3799  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_ARGUMENTS) {
3800  return EINVAL;
3801  }else{
3802  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
3803  *fd = resp.fd();
3804  return 0;
3805  }
3806 }

3833  return ENOENT;

3846 int sys_mknodat(int dirfd, const char *path, int mode, int dev) {

3857  getPosixLane(),

3859  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadTail(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
3860  helix_ng::recvInline()
3861  )
3862  );
3863 
3864  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
3865  HEL_CHECK(send_head.error());
3866  HEL_CHECK(send_tail.error());
3867  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
3868

3870  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
3871  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
3872  return ENOENT;
3873  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ALREADY_EXISTS) {
3874  return EEXIST;
3875  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::BAD_FD) {
3876  return EBADF;
3877  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::ILLEGAL_ARGUMENTS) {
3878  return EINVAL;
3879  }else{

3908  )

3914  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());

3919  return EBADF;
3920  }else*/

4120 int sys_seek(int fd, off_t offset, int whence, off_t *new_offset) {
4121  SignalGuard sguard;
4122 
4123  auto handle = getHandleForFd(fd);
4124  if(!handle)
4125  return EBADF;
4126 
4127  managarm::fs::CntRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
4128  req.set_fd(fd);
4129  req.set_rel_offset(offset);
4130 
4131  if(whence == SEEK_SET) {
4132  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::SEEK_ABS);
4133  }else if(whence == SEEK_CUR) {
4134  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::SEEK_REL);
4135  }else if(whence == SEEK_END) {
4136  req.set_req_type(managarm::fs::CntReqType::SEEK_EOF);
4137  }else{
4138  return EINVAL;
4139  }
4140 
4141  frg::string<MemoryAllocator> ser(getSysdepsAllocator());
4142  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
4143 
4144  auto [offer, send_req, recv_resp] = exchangeMsgsSync(
4145  handle,
4146  helix_ng::offer(
4147  helix_ng::sendBuffer(ser.data(), ser.size()),
4148  helix_ng::recvInline()
4149  )
4150  );
4151 
4152  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
4153  HEL_CHECK(send_req.error());
4154  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
4155 
4156  managarm::fs::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
4157  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
4158  if(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SEEK_ON_PIPE) {
4159  return ESPIPE;
4160  }else{
4161  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::fs::Errors::SUCCESS);
4162  *new_offset = resp.offset();
4163  return 0;
4164  }

4298 int sys_stat(fsfd_target fsfdt, int fd, const char *path, int flags, struct stat *result) {
4299  SignalGuard sguard;
4300 
4301  managarm::posix::FstatAtRequest<MemoryAllocator> req(getSysdepsAllocator());
4302  if (fsfdt == fsfd_target::path) {
4303  req.set_fd(AT_FDCWD);
4304  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), path));
4305  } else if (fsfdt == fsfd_target::fd) {
4306  flags |= AT_EMPTY_PATH;
4307  req.set_fd(fd);
4308  } else {
4309  __ensure(fsfdt == fsfd_target::fd_path);
4310  req.set_fd(fd);
4311  req.set_path(frg::string<MemoryAllocator>(getSysdepsAllocator(), path));
4312  }
4313 
4314  if (flags & ~(AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW | AT_EMPTY_PATH)) {
4315  return EINVAL;
4316  }
4317 
4318  if (!(flags & AT_EMPTY_PATH) && (!path || !strlen(path))) {
4319  return ENOENT;
4320  }
4321 
4322  req.set_flags(flags);
4323 
4324  auto [offer, send_head, send_tail, recv_resp] =
4325  exchangeMsgsSync(
4326  getPosixLane(),
4327  helix_ng::offer(
4328  helix_ng::sendBragiHeadTail(req, getSysdepsAllocator()),
4329  helix_ng::recvInline()
4330  )
4331  );
4332 
4333  HEL_CHECK(offer.error());
4334  HEL_CHECK(send_head.error());
4335  HEL_CHECK(send_tail.error());
4336  HEL_CHECK(recv_resp.error());
4337 
4338  managarm::posix::SvrResponse<MemoryAllocator> resp(getSysdepsAllocator());
4339  resp.ParseFromArray(recv_resp.data(), recv_resp.length());
4340  if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::FILE_NOT_FOUND) {
4341  return ENOENT;
4342  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::BAD_FD) {
4343  return EBADF;
4344  }else if(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::NOT_A_DIRECTORY) {
4345  return ENOTDIR;
4346  }else{
4347  __ensure(resp.error() == managarm::posix::Errors::SUCCESS);
4348  memset(result, 0, sizeof(struct stat));
4349 
4350  switch(resp.file_type()) {
4351  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_REGULAR:
4352  result->st_mode = S_IFREG; break;
4353  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_DIRECTORY:
4354  result->st_mode = S_IFDIR; break;
4355  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_SYMLINK:
4356  result->st_mode = S_IFLNK; break;
4357  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_CHAR_DEVICE:
4358  result->st_mode = S_IFCHR; break;
4359  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_BLOCK_DEVICE:
4360  result->st_mode = S_IFBLK; break;
4361  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_SOCKET:
4362  result->st_mode = S_IFSOCK; break;
4363  case managarm::posix::FileType::FT_FIFO:
4364  result->st_mode = S_IFIFO; break;
4365  default:
4366  __ensure(!resp.file_type());
4367  }
4368 
4369  result->st_dev = 1;
4370  result->st_ino = resp.fs_inode();
4371  result->st_mode |= resp.mode();
4372  result->st_nlink = resp.num_links();
4373  result->st_uid = resp.uid();
4374  result->st_gid = resp.gid();
4375  result->st_rdev = resp.ref_devnum();
4376  result->st_size = resp.file_size();
4377  result->st_atim.tv_sec = resp.atime_secs();
4378  result->st_atim.tv_nsec = resp.atime_nanos();
4379  result->st_mtim.tv_sec = resp.mtime_secs();
4380  result->st_mtim.tv_nsec = resp.mtime_nanos();
4381  result->st_ctim.tv_sec = resp.ctime_secs();
4382  result->st_ctim.tv_nsec = resp.ctime_nanos();
4383  result->st_blksize = 4096;
4384  result->st_blocks = resp.file_size() / 512 + 1;
4385  return 0;
4386  }
4387 }

4389 int sys_readlink(const char *path, void *data, size_t max_size, ssize_t *length) {
4390  SignalGuard sguard;

4393

4397

4399  req.SerializeToString(&ser);
4400  actions[0].type = kHelActionOffer;
4401  actions[0].flags = kHelItemAncillary;
4402  actions[1].type = kHelActionSendFromBuffer;
4403  actions[1].flags = kHelItemChain;
4404  actions[1].buffer = ser.data();
4405  actions[1].length = ser.size();

4409  actions[3].flags = 0;
4410  actions[3].buffer = data;
4411  actions[3].length = max_size;

4413  globalQueue.getQueue(), 0, 0));

4819 int sys_getentropy(void *buffer, size_t length) {
4820  SignalGuard sguard;
4821  auto p = reinterpret_cast<char *>(buffer);
4822  size_t n = 0;
4823 
4824  while(n < length) {
4825  size_t chunk;
4826  HEL_CHECK(helGetRandomBytes(p + n, length - n, &chunk));
4827  n+= chunk;
4828  }
4829 
4830  return 0;
4831 }
